data.name: Silent Bloom
data.detailed_description:
the Soul Is Like A Flower, The Body Is The Vessel For It To Grow...

Silent Bloom Is A Solo-Developed, Hand-Drawn, 3d Action Adventure That Combines Puzzle Solving With Dungeon Crawling Gameplay.
Explore Through Multiple Environments Faced With Dynamic Enemies And Puzzles That Grow Challenging As You Go On.
Discover Different Paths As You Shift Back And Forth Between 2 Diverse Atmospheric Worlds.


Discover A Vast Set Of Both Friendly And Dangerous Spirits As well As Fellow Explorers, Exorcist And Characters.
They All Have Their Own Purpose And Story To Tell.

Face Off Against Many Angst Spiritual foes And Even Some Unfriendly Delinquent's As You Move Around In The Walls Of Both Physical And Spiritual Worlds. Engage In Dungeon Crawling Action In Various Forms From Close Combat To Even Evasive Stealth Challenges.
